summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2659, for the improvement of East 55th Street, from 29th Avenue Northeast to 35th Avenue Northeast; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, constructing concrete sidewalks, and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 31273 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
